ClassDesc: A http:##developer#android#com@B_java#util#List_E@ that notifies when changes are made. An ObservableList bound to the UI will keep the it up-to-date when changes occur. The ObservableList must notify its callbacks whenever a change to the list occurs, using @B_android#databinding#ObservableList#OnListChangedCallback_E@. ObservableArrayList implements ObservableList with an underlying ArrayList. ListChangeRegistry can help in maintaining the callbacks of other implementations.
